attributes.action: Lies used by the 'leave' campaign should allow voters to void their votes.
attributes.background: We, who voted 'leave' in the EU referendum call upon HM government to allow us to void our vote, based on the lies we have been told and led to believe during the campaign.

rejection.details:
If you would like there to be a second referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753

If you would like the referendum result to be declared void, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139789
